titles.title: Congratulating Iowa State University for its efforts to refurbish and rededicate Morrill Hall.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: 4/17/2007--Introduced. Congratulates Iowa State University for its efforts to refurbish and rededicate Morrill Hall.
